text: The Game & Watch is a series of small, hand-held video games made by Gunpei Yokoi of Nintendo from 1980 to 1991. The games were usually simplistic (For example, "Chef" required keeping food in the air). The Game & Watch was invented before the Game Boy. Until 1985 with the Nintendo Entertainment System, the Game & Watch was Nintendo's only foothold in the North American video game market. == Mr. Game & Watch == is the main character in Game & Watch that also appeared in Super Smash Bros. Melee and Super Smash Bros. Brawl. Category:Nintendo
title: Game & Watch
